'''Orron''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|A dwarf sits before a generous and curious spread - steamed mussels arranged in concentric circles, rounds of flatbread stacked in a neat tower, and melon sliced in even triangles.

Yet his attention is focused on the four cups and the bottle in front of him.

He has the cups organized in an almost perfect square around the bottle, but as you look on, he leans down to adjust one.

The others with him wait quietly and observe the ritual.

Holding his breath, he takes the bottle and measures an equal serving of wine into the cups, making three or four passes over each.

His companions look on with practiced patience.

At last the bottle is empty, and he places it in the exact center of the square.

He picks it up and puts it down in the same spot twice more before he's satisfied.}}
Orron leads a squad of [Goldpact Knights](/goldpactKnights/) fresh off a contract with the [VTC](/vtc/), for protecting one of their most valuable properties - the [Luminous Adra Mill](/luminousAdraMill/). They are now bound for [Takowa](/takowa/) for another contract with [Rauatai](/rauatai/).

## Interactions

 
{{Interactions

|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [All Aboard](/allAboard/)
|none            = 
|other           =
* Orron is obsessive-compulsive, and doesn't like when things aren't arranged just so. You can disrupt his arrangement to incite a gasp from the rest of his crew, and do it again to start a fight.
}}

## =Quests

=
* [All Aboard](/allAboard/): Orron has a reservation on Captain [Sedūzo](/seduzo/)'s ship bound for the [Rauatai Gulf](/rauataiGulf/). You'll have to convince him to change to another ship in order to find passage for [Biha](/biha/) and her children.

## Trivia

* Despite being a [Goldpact Knight](/goldpactKnights/), Orron's actual [Paladin](/paladin/) subclass is [Kind Wayfarers](/kindWayfarers/).
